sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Hundreds rally in Niger's capital in support of coup leaders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: As a deadline to reinstate ousted President Mohamed Bazoum looms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A Russian missile strikes a historic cathedral in Kherson, marking the latest attack on Ukraine's cultural heritage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The European Union fast-tracks new restrictions on Minsk in a bid to ensure Russia can't circumvent sanctions through Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Niger's coup leaders and their supporters remain defiant as a deadline of August 6 set by neighboring regional countries to reinstate President Mohamed Bazoum looms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Hundreds demonstrated on Thursday in support of the new regime in Niamey, while senior rebel officials met with counterparts in Burkina Faso, which along with Mali has backed the putsch.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But the majority of West African states have vowed to restore democracy in Niger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: At a meeting on Wednesday, they left open the possibility of military intervention, drawing the anger of the coup's leaders. Those sanctions may already be having an impact.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: At a market in Niamey, shoppers said prices have gone up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, France says it has completed its evacuation of French and European citizens other Western nations are taking similar action with the US and UK now announcing the withdrawing some embassy staff seat Catherine's Cathedral in hair sewn southern Ukraine is the latest historical monument damaged by Russian bombs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This church, famous for housing the remains of a celebrated 18th century Russian commander, suffered damage to its roof and interior.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Four emergency service members were injured while trying to extinguish a fire sparked by the strike. During the fire in the spring, there was an attack this morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: There was an attack around the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: At that time, all the work with the fire was stopped.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: We were waiting for the attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: And then the firemen finished their work, which we thank them for.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Ukraine has accused Russia of trying to erase its cultural heritage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Last month, another bombardment severely damaged a cathedral in Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This, as a residential neighborhood in the eastern Ukrainian city of Slovyansk, was also targeted overnight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Five missiles damaged roofs and windows, but there were no casualties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And both Kiev and Moscow have reported that they intercepted enemy drones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A new twist to the European Union's sanctions against Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In a bid to prevent them being circumvented through Moscow's close ally Belarus, the European Council has fast-tracked a series of new restrictions targeting Minsk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: These expand the ban on exports to Belarus of a number of highly sensitive goods and technologies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Council has also imposed an additional export block on firearms and ammunition, and on goods and technology suited for use in aviation and the space industry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Minsk has been Russia's closest ally since the start of the Kremlin's war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Moscow used Belarus' territory for the invasion and has also taken advantage of its neighbors' support to circumvent sanctions imposed by the international community.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis has met survivors of clerical sexual abuse carried out in Portugal and blasted the country's Catholic hierarchy for its response.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Francis addressed the scandal on the first day of a five-day visit to Lisbon for the Catholic Church's World Youth Day festival. en el primer día de una visita de cinco días a Lisboa para el Festival de la Iglesia Católica de la Juventud Mundial. y por los escándalos que han desfigurado su rostro y que llaman a una purificación humilde y constante, partiendo del grito de dolor de las víctimas que siempre han de ser acogidas y escuchadas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Después de su adreza y fuera de las cámaras, Francisco habló con 13 víctimas de abuso por más de una hora.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: La visita del Papa viene después de un panel de expertos contratados por los bíspios de Portugal, 13 abuse victims for more than an hour. The Pope's visit comes after a panel of experts hired by Portugal's bishops reported in February that priests and other church personnel may have abused thousands of boys and girls since 1950.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: After the document's release, the bishops initially refused to remove named abusers from their posts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This is Francis' fourth World Youth Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The festival was launched by Pope John Paul II in the 1980s to invigorate the church's younger members.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Donald Trump is preparing for his court hearing in Washington DC today where he

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: will formally be charged for trying to overturn the 2020 election. Security is being ramped up outside the court, although he may have the option to attend virtually.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Trump faces four counts, including conspiracy to defraud the US, tampering with a witness and conspiracy against the rights of citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: While these are historic in the sense that it's the first for a president to be indicted with spreading lies, it's only one of three cases against him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In other proceedings, Trump is being charged with mishandling classified files and falsifying business records to cover up a hush money payment to an adult film star.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And prosecutors in Georgia may bring a fourth criminal case forward.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Over allegations Trump tried to subvert the 2020 election results there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: These legal troubles come as Trump campaigns to return to the White House.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He is currently the clear front runner in the Republican Party's contest to pick its next presidential candidate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And latest opinion polls have him and current President Joe Biden level at 43%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Joe Biden level at 43%. From violent storms to unrelenting heat, Asia is experiencing a summer of extreme weather.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Taiwan is bracing for the arrival of Typhoon Canaan, which was predicted to bring heavy rains and winds of more than 160 kilometers per hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It has already lashed Japan's southern islands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: China is also reeling from the effects of Typhoon Dok-sun, which has caused deaths and devastation across the Beijing region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: At least 21 people have been killed in widespread flooding following the heaviest rains in the area in 140 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In South Korea, soaring temperatures are posing a different kind of threat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: More than 100 people have been treated for heat-related illnesses at the World Scout Jamboree.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The mercury is set to remain in the mid-30s in the coming days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Around the world, climate records are being broken by what experts say is a combination of global warming and the El Niño weather phenomenon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Last month's huge fire at the landfill site in Zielona Gora is at the centre of an ongoing dispute over Poland's waste management policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Inadequate storage and treatment along with illegal waste loads have become literally a burning problem in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Many accuse those in power of negligence. To jest praktycznie problem w kraju. Wielu wskazuje, że to jest władza negligeracji. Mamy zastrzeżenia do działania wszystkich służb, które nas nie informują o faktycznym stanie środowiska.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Dopiero po tygodniu pojawił się pierwszy komunikat, żeby uważać się z plonami, które mamy na swoich ogródkach.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: To było po zgrupowaniu, kiedy Polska Ministra Klimatu podjęła komplet z Komisją Europejską w sprawie 35 tysięcy ton zlewów z Niemiec.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: To pierwszy krok, zanim się podpisać do Justycy Europejskiej.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Wiele władz Republiki Federalnej Niemiec nie poczuwają się do tego, żeby te odpady odebrać, from Germany. It's the first step before applying to the European Court of Justice. The German authorities do not feel like taking the waste away, so we wanted to solve this case by the wayside, but it did not work. Therefore, according to the law, every state of the CZU has the right to file a complaint with the European Commission. We did it for other countries. The European Commission has three months to analyze and answer this matter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Christopher Stolzenberg from the German Ministry for the Environment has commented, saying returning illegal shipments is the responsibility of the federal states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He added, however, that the fact that illegal waste shipments from Germany are taking place is of great concern to them and that the ministry remains committed to improving the prevention of illegal waste shipments in the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The case of the landfill in Gilonagora put the problem of illegal transport and storage of waste in the spotlight. Some observers say it's a bigger problem than people realise. Na terenie kraju znajduje się teraz ponad 400 takich składowisk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Z tego około 140 to są miejsca, w których wykryto wyłącznie odpady niebezpieczne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Coraz więcej dziennikarzy podnosi ten temat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Urzędnicy też zmagają się z tym od już dłuższego czasu.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Więc mam nadzieję, że ta tendencja walki z przestępczością środowiskową, tutaj stricte walką z niebezpiecznymi odpadami, się rozwinie i tych składowisk będzie ujawnianych więcej, ale też więcej będzie utylizowanych.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Dzięki wody w lądowiskach, rząd uważa, że daje więcej wsparcia do mieszkań w zakresie wstępu.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Oficerzy pewnie czą, że jest wyższa presja, żeby teraz działać przed wyborami. Magdalena Rodowlik, Eurodysk. communities in waste disposal. The officials will certainly feel increased pressure to act now, ahead of the elections. Magdalena Rodovic for Euronews from Girona Gura.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Greenpeace activists have covered a house belonging to UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: with black fabric in protest at his government's decision to authorize further oil and gas exploration in the North Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The canvas symbolizing oil was hung over the front of the property in Yorkshire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Sunak said that the 100 new extraction licenses would bolster Britain's energy security and create jobs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He said it was preferential to getting fossil fuels from what he called hostile states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Two-times champion Germany crashed out of the Women's World Cup on Thursday after they were held to a frustrating one-all draw by South Korea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Korean team took the lead early on with a goal by Cho Soo-yoon, but Germany came back with an equaliser from captain Alexandre Poppe just before half-time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: With Morocco leading Colombia in the other group match, Germany needed a win to advance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But despite creating many opportunities, it wasn't to be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's the first time ever that the German team has failed to reach the knockout phase. Colombia topped Group H and Morocco took second place with six points.
